title: Lower FPS?
body:
So I used to be able to get 120 FPS on this computer I have. Recently, however, I can't even get it above 60. 

Is there any reason for this? My computer runs every other game just fine. It's just League, and I'm not sure what happened.

replies.body:
Framerate issues can be caused by a few different factors, but are mostly seen as a result of display driver or windows power setting issues. I strongly recommend working through our [**FPS troubleshooting guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), as it covers the most common solutions for this.

Please let me know if this caused any change.

BOYS! i know how to fix this fps issues ( IM SO HAPPY )
it can take 1hour to fix him.
first step: update java to java 121
and finaly in the launcher,
u need to click to the case ( the ''?"" ) and click the scanning files.
And then enjoy.
Go to say that to riot
